CustomField.description: Used in Third Party Pledge Payments. This controls whether the pledged organization's DCO gets soft credited. If True, then DCO will get soft credits. If False, then the DCO will not get soft credits.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in Third Party Pledge Payments. This controls whether the pledged organization's DCO gets soft credited. If True, then DCO will get soft credits. If False, then the DCO will not get soft credits.
CustomField.label: Third Party - Enable Donor DCO
